title: Bern with Belltower
marks: Signature and Stamp LR: [E L Kirchner]; stamped on verso: [KN-DaAb8]
description: City view of Bern with clock belltower.
provenance: Estate of the artist; (Curt Valentin [d. 1954] through Buchholz Gallery, New York, New York through July 15, 1955); Putnam Dana McMillan [d. 1961], Minneapolis, Minnesota by 1955 through 1961; bequeathed to MIA on November 15, 1961.
